article: u.s. president george w. bush has written letters to kim jong-il , leader of the democratic people 's republic of korea -lrb- dprk -rrb- , and the four other parties in nuclear talks , urging pyongyang to fully disclose its atomic activities , the white house said thursday .
abstract: bush urges dprk to fully disclose nuclear activities

bush writes to kim jong-il and the four other parties in nuclear talks.
he urges them to fully disclose its atomic activities.
